content:
I want to maximize the likelihood that our collective efforts yield products that might be integrated at some future point. To this end, I think we should provide a project template that people can use to develop their project code.

Some things this should include

  • Examples of intake access to CESM2 CMIP6 integrations, the CESM-LE, etc.
  • Environment definitition

@Anderson Banihirwe, perhaps you can help with this?
Should we use ncar-hackathons GitHub organization for hosting this project template?
